explains: n. 兴高采烈，得意洋洋

sentences.en: His supporters have reacted to the news with elation.
sentences.cn: 他的支持者们听到这个消息后兴高采烈。

sentences.en: Her moods oscillated between depression and elation.
sentences.cn: 她的情绪时而抑郁，时而亢奋。

sentences.en: There was no elation in his gait, which kept pace with the action of his sombre mind.
sentences.cn: 他的步态并不得意，因为他的步态和他忧郁的心情是同步的。
